DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: WITH CTE (CatalogId, ParentCatalogId, CatalogType, CatalogCode, CatalogName, EntityType, EntityId, [Level]) as (§§n select CatalogId, ParentCatalogId, CatalogType, CatalogCode, CatalogName, EntityType, EntityId, 0 as [Level]§§n from tbCatalog§§n where CatalogId=:@CatalogId§§n§§n union all§§n§§n select CH.CatalogId, CH.ParentCatalogId, CH.CatalogType, CH.CatalogCode, CH.CatalogName, CH.EntityType, CH.EntityId, CTE.Level + 1§§n from§§n tbCatalog CH inner join§§n CTE on CTE.CatalogId=CH.ParentCatalogId§§n)§§n§§nselect §§n CatalogId, §§n ParentCatalogId, §§n CatalogType, §§n LK_CatalogType.ItemName as CatalogTypeDesc,§§n EntityType, §§n LK_EntityType.ItemName as EntityTypeDesc,§§n EntityId, §§n Coalesce(EVN.EventCode, PRD.ProductCode, PF.ProductFamilyCode, CatalogCode) as EntityCode, §§n Coalesce(EVN.EventName, PRD.ProductName, PF.ProductFamilyName, CatalogName) as EntityName, §§n [Level]§§nfrom §§n CTE left join§§n tbEvent EVN on CTE.EntityType=5 and EVN.EventId=CTE.EntityId left join§§n tbProduct PRD on CTE.EntityType=12 and PRD.ProductId=CTE.EntityId left join§§n tbProductFamily PF on CTE.EntityType=75 and PF.ProductFamilyId=CTE.EntityId left join§§n tbLookupItem LK_CatalogType on LK_CatalogType.TableCode=172 and LK_CatalogType.ItemCode=CTE.CatalogType left join§§n tbLookupItem LK_EntityType on LK_EntityType.TableCode=131 and LK_EntityType.ItemCode=CTE.EntityType§§n
